translations: 有瘤的；驼背的；有肉峰的
使隆起；使烦闷（hump 的过去分词）

phrs.translation: v. 度过最困难时期；已度过一半时间

sentences.sentence: I was humped like an old lady.
sentences.translation: 我像个老妇人似的驼着背。

sentences.sentence: He was tall and broad with humped shoulders.
Your huge desk has been humped up by six of us.
sentences.translation: 我们六个人已把你那张大书桌搬上去了。
